Tests for Utilities - Sequences

test_mtcdb.test_utils.test_sequences [module]

Tests for the module mtcdb.utils.sequences.

test_unique(sequence, expected_output)[source]

Test for mtcdb.utils.sequences.unique().

Test Inputs:

sequence (Iterable [test parameter]) – One simple sequence is tested for each type: list, tuple, ndarray.

Implementation

For arrays, assess equality with np.array_equal() instead of ==.
